Title: Object: Arab Village near the Pyramids
Series: Picturesque Egypt
Description: Postcard; printed paper; reproduction of a watercolour showing a small group of Egyptian men, children and a woman with a jar balanced on her head, beside the river Nile with a pyramid behind and a mudbrick village to the right.
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: IX (printed postcard number (Oilette series))
